text: Ilya PrigogineIlya Romanovich Prigogine () (25 January 1917 – 28 May 2003) was a Belgian physical chemist of Russian Jewish descent.www.telegraph.co.uk He won the 1977 Nobel Prize for Chemistry.NobelPrize.org, "Ilya Prigogine"; retrieved 2012-9-19. Prigogine studied chemistry at the Free University of Brussels. In 1950 he became a professor there. In 1959 he started teaching at the University of Texas at Austin in the United States. Prigogine was married to Belgian poet Hélène Jofé.
